title: Discord agents knock each other out of VC
body:
**Describe the bug**

When running two agents in the same client one will join the discord voice channel and then when 2nd agent joins it kicks the first agent out of discord

**Additional context**

- whichever character is listed last is the one that stays in the voice channel
- the same thing happens even if sending the agents to different voice channels. 
- only tested from 1 discord server, 2 unique servers may produce a different outcome
author: vincentskele

comments.body:
Hi @vincentskele there is a potential fix in #1156 that is already merged into `develop` branch.
Kindly try that and give feedback.
ran into some other issues with develop but the conflict with discord is resolved!

Thanks for the feedback. 
What are the other issues?
all resolved now with latest pull from develop

satisfaction_conditions: Prevents multiple agents from disconnecting each other when joining voice channels
Maintains functionality across multiple voice channels
Works consistently regardless of agent initialization order
Integrates without causing new system conflicts

_classification.category: Requires build environment but hard to be dockerized
